comments.body:
> ```
> ###sourceLocation(file: "/Users/Denys/.src/native/nativelib/src/main/scala/scala/scalanative/native/FunctionPtr.scala.gyb", line: 14)
> ```

I think it's not good that line comments include user specific information such as `/Users/Denys/`.  Such information should be removed.

That's an artifact of our current code generation tool that we borrowed from Swift (called gyb.) There is an issue to replace it with something better (https://github.com/scala-native/scala-native/issues/135) but that's out-of-scope for M3.
